title: Balloon 8 - 11:30PM
text:
It’s almost midnight.
Let’s reflect on 2024 and look forward to 2025. Time to fill in those New Year’s sheets.

title: Balloon 6 - 10:00PM
text: Who’s the best singer? Who knows all the lyrics? Let’s play some blind karaoke and find out?

title: Balloon 4 - 08:30 PM
text:
It’s time for a game.
Let’s play charades
Click the button below for the name of a movie or a song and describe it to your friends just using actions. Now words or sounds.
New Charade

title: Balloon 2 - 7:00 PM
text:
Another Game!
Do you feel creative? Do you like fun?
Everyone grab your devices and let’s play Jackbox on the TV!

title: Balloon 1 - 6:00 PM
text: Friends have started to come. Let’s start with some tasty snacks whilst we wait for everyone to arrive.

title: Balloon 3 - 8:00 PM
text:
Time for some challenges.
We’re going to play some “minute-to-win-it” games.
Who can move a cookie from their forehead into their mouth without using their hands?
Who is the fastest at moving M&Ms using just a straw?

title: Balloon 5 - 9:00PM
text: Time for another game. This time we’ll play SCRAWL.

title: Balloon 7 - 11:00PM
text: Time for another game. This time we’ll play Heads Up.

title: Balloon 9 - MIDNIGHT
text:
HAPPY NEW YEAR!
Celebrate the new year with friends.
